item.description:
The North Street Grille is a neighborhood place known for the best brunch in the North End. It's packed every Sunday. So if you RSVP, please come because seats are at a premium. Brunch entrees run $6-15 and there are a huge number of choices. Reviews:

http://www.yelp.com/biz/north-street-grille-boston-2 Directions: If you're at the Paul Revere House on North Street, cross the square and walk down the small street just to the left of the Sacred Heart Church. Please bring cash, as we will not get separate checks. It should be yummy!

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.name: North Street Grille-Sunday Brunch
